thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Ares Capital And Varagon Capital Expand Senior Direct Loan Program To $6.4 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ares Capital And Varagon Capital Expand Senior Direct Loan Program To $6.4 Bln
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Ares Capital Corp:
* ARES CAPITAL CORPORATION AND VARAGON CAPITAL PARTNERS EXPAND SENIOR DIRECT LOAN PROGRAM TO $6.4 BILLION
* ARES CAPITAL CORP - $2.5 BILLION OF NEW CAPITAL AVAILABLE FOR SENIOR DIRECT LOAN PROGRAM FROM AIG AND ANOTHER LARGE, GLOBAL INSURANCE COMPANY
* ARES CAPITAL - AIG, AN EXISTING INVESTOR IN CO AND VARAGONâ€˜S SENIOR DIRECT LENDING PROGRAM, INCREASED ITS CAPITAL AVAILABLE BY $500 MILLION TO $2.75 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
